title: Anthony Joshua Wins Boxing Match Against Jake Paul
summary: Anthony Joshua, a famous boxer, fought Jake Paul, who used to be a YouTuber, in a boxing match in Miami. Joshua won the fight by stopping Paul in the sixth round. This means Joshua was much better and the fight was not close. The article talks about the match and includes videos with comments from people like Joshua and Paul. It shows that Joshua was confident and did not worry about the fight's fairness. The event was exciting for boxing fans.

keywords.explanation: a person who fights in the sport of boxing
someone who makes videos on YouTube
when a fight is ended by the referee because one fighter cannot continue
a city in Florida where the fight happened
feeling sure about doing something well

questions.question: What was Jake Paul before he became a boxer?
In which round did the fight end?
Where did the fight take place?
Why was the fight described as not close?
What did Joshua say about carrying Paul?
options: He would carry him for one second
He would not carry him for one second
He wanted to dance with him
questions.correct_answer: He would not carry him for one second

background_read: Boxing is a sport where two people fight with gloves in a ring. Anthony Joshua is a professional boxer from England who has won world championships. Jake Paul is a social media star who started boxing for fun and money. Matches like this bring together different types of athletes and can be exciting for fans to watch.
Article_Structure: WHO: Anthony Joshua and Jake Paul
WHAT: A boxing match where Joshua won by stoppage
WHY: To see who is the better fighter and for entertainment

perspectives.description: He was confident and focused on winning without worrying about the fight's fairness.
He tried to shock people by beating Joshua but lost in a one-sided contest.
